articles.author: Mike Potter
articles.title: Here's how to get the best view of the Geminids meteor shower in central Indiana in 2024 - WTHR
articles.description: One of the most impressive meteor showers of the year will be peaking in mid-December 2024. Here's how to get the best view.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS The Geminids meteor shower is one of the most impressive of the year. At its peak, you might see two shooting stars per minute. 
The shower is already underway, with a particularly brig… [+3751 chars]
